KermitRotation01Start: ^Kermit: I’ve been sitting here a while with all these beautiful people.
^Kermit: Do you know how we got here?

c-0: ^You: I have no idea what’s going on.
^You: It feels like I’m in the right place, physically you know, on the table.
^Kermit: It’s nice to sit in places you wouldn’t expect.
c-1: ^You: I’m not sure what’s happened, do you remember anything?
^You: What were you doing before this?
^Kermit: There I was in my kitchen making a pasta dinner with the beautiful Miss Piggy.
^Kermit: I gave her a big smooch and the next thing I know, I’m here.
^Kermit: I woke up and started singing a song about not knowing where you are until everyone came to.
c-2: ^You: I remember bright lights, then a loud ringing in my ears, and I guess your shining face just now.
^Kermit: Wow, I’d like to know how my face got to shining.
^You: You have one of those smiles that just shines green.

c-0: ^You: Do you want to sing the song for me?
^Kermit: “Sometimes you go places. Places you don’t know, and you ask yourself, how did I get here?
^Kermit: Oh I don’t know, but we know, someone has got to know…
^Kermit: where you go when you’ve got places to go”!
^You: That was...such a good song thanks.
^Kermit: Life is made up of meetings and partings. That is the way of it.
c-1: ^Kermit: Miss Piggy and I go way back. We have a deep understanding.

KermitRotation01End: ^Kermit: By the way…Do you know the person next to me? Could you introduce us?
^Kermit: I’m feeling a little shy to do so myself. He’s got a certain passion about him.
^You: I can’t guarantee anything, I just got here.
